feed.title: Google Cloud: Datastream
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: Datastream

entry.content: Datastream now supports Spanner as a source. For more information, see the Datastream documentation.
entry.summary: Datastream has added support for Spanner as a data source. This integration allows for seamless data replication from Spanner into other destinations. For more details, please refer to the Datastream documentation.
entry.title: Feature: Datastream now supports Spanner

entry.content: Datastream now supports partitioning and clustering for BigQuery destinations. For more information, see the documentation.
entry.summary: Datastream now supports partitioning and clustering for BigQuery destinations.
entry.title: Feature: Datastream BigQuery Integration

entry.content: Datastream support for Salesforce as a source is now generally available (GA). For more information, see the documentation.
entry.summary: Datastream now supports Salesforce as a source, and it is generally available.
entry.title: Feature: Datastream for Salesforce

entry.content: Datastream support for MongoDB as a source is now generally available (GA). For more information, see the documentation.
entry.summary: Datastream now supports MongoDB as a source, which is now generally available.
entry.title: Feature: Datastream MongoDB Source Now Available

entry.content: Datastream is now available in the northamerica-south1 (Mexico) region. For the list of all available regions, see IP allowlists and regions.
entry.summary: Datastream is now available in Mexico (northamerica-south1). For more details, refer to the IP allowlists and regions documentation.
entry.title: Feature: Datastream now available in Mexico

entry.content:
Datastream now supports BigLake Iceberg tables as a destination both in the Google Cloud console and the Datastream API.

For more information, see the Datastream documentation.
entry.summary: Datastream now supports BigLake Iceberg tables as a destination, accessible via the Google Cloud console and the Datastream API.
entry.title: Feature: Datastream supports BigLake Iceberg tables
